name: Name
deactivate_account_description: When deactivating an account, all of the data and resources within that account will be permanently removed and cannot be recovered.
you_do_not_have_the_permission_to_access: You do not have the permission to access this page.
failed_to_sign_out_please_try_again: Failed to sign out. Please try again.
something_went_wrong_please_try_again: Something went wrong. Please try again.
password_length_should_me_more_than_8_ch: Password length should me more than 8 characters.
select_or_customize_your_interface_color: Select or customize your interface color scheme.
enter_a_valid_hex_code_of_6_characters: Enter a valid hex code of 6 characters
stay_in_the_loop_on_issues_you_are_subsc: Stay in the loop on Issues you are subscribed to. Enable this to get notified.
failed_to_update_email_notification_sett: Failed to update email notification setting
property_changes_description: Notify me when issue's properties like assignees, priority, estimates or anything else changes.
state_change_description: Notify me when the issues moves to a different state
issue_completed_description: Notify me only when an issue is completed
comments_description: Notify me when someone leaves a comment on the issue
mentions_description: Notify me only when someone mentions me in the comments or description
only_your_instance_admin_can_create_work: Only your instance admin can create workspaces
If you know your instance admin's email address, click the button below to get in touch with them.
workspace_could_not_be_created_please_tr: Workspace could not be created. Please try again.
Some error occurred while creating workspace. Please try again.
workspaces_names_can_contain_only_space_: Workspaces names can contain only (' '), ('-'), ('_') and alphanumeric characters.
how_many_people_will_use_this_workspace: How many people will use this workspace?
how_many_people_will_use_this_workspace_: This will help us to determine the number of seats you need to purchase.
urls_can_contain_only_dash_and_alphanume: URLs can contain only ('-') and alphanumeric characters.
something_familiar_and_recognizable_is_a: Something familiar and recognizable is always best.
active_cycles_description: Monitor cycles across projects, track high-priority issues, and zoom in cycles that need attention.
on_demand_snapshots_of_all_your_cycles: On-demand snapshots of all your cycles
10000_feet_view_description: Zoom out to see running cycles across all your projects at once instead of going from Cycle to Cycle in each project.
get_snapshot_of_each_active_cycle: Get a snapshot of each active cycle.
get_snapshot_of_each_active_cycle_descri: Track high-level metrics for all active cycles, see their state of progress, and get a sense of scope against deadlines.
compare_burndowns_description: Monitor how each of your teams are performing with a peek into each cycle's burndown report.
quickly_see_make_or_break_issues_descrip: Preview high-priority issues for each cycle against due dates. See all of them per cycle in one click.
zoom_into_cycles_that_need_attention: Zoom into cycles that need attention.
zoom_into_cycles_that_need_attention_des: Investigate the state of any cycle that doesn't conform to expectations in one click.
stay_ahead_of_blockers_description: Spot challenges from one project to another and see inter-cycle dependencies that aren't obvious from any other view.
failed_to_remove_project_from_favorites: Couldn't remove the project from favorites. Please try again.
project_created_successfully_description: Project created successfully. You can now start adding issues to it.
title_should_be_less_than_255_characters: Title should be less than 255 characters
project_id_must_be_at_least_1_character: Project ID must at least be of 1 character
project_id_must_be_at_most_5_characters: Project ID must at most be of 5 characters
project_id_tooltip_content: Helps you identify issues in the project uniquely. Max 5 characters.
only_alphanumeric_non_latin_characters_a: Only Alphanumeric & Non-latin characters are allowed.
anyone_in_the_workspace_except_guests_ca: Anyone in the workspace except Guests can join
couldnt_add_the_project_to_favorites: Couldn't add the project to favorites. Please try again.
couldnt_remove_the_project_from_favorite: Couldn't remove the project from favorites. Please try again.
projects_and_issues_description: Toggle these on or off this project.
cycles_description: Timebox work as you see fit per project and change frequency from one period to the next.
modules_description: Group work into sub-project-like set-ups with their own leads and assignees.
views_description: Save sorts, filters, and display options for later or share them.
pages_description: Write anything like you write anything.
intake_description: Stay in the loop on Issues you are subscribed to. Enable this to get notified.
time_tracking_description: Track time spent on issues and projects.
work_management_description: Manage your work and projects with ease.
we_are_having_trouble_fetching_the_updat: We are having trouble fetching the updates.
please_select_at_least_one_invitation: Please select at least one invitation.
please_select_at_least_one_invitation_de: Please select at least one invitation to join the workspace.
we_see_that_someone_has_invited_you_to_j: We see that someone has invited you to join a workspace
We see that someone has invited you to join a workspace
you_can_see_here_if_someone_invites_you_: You can see here if someone invites you to a workspace
deactivate_your_account_description: Once deactivated, you can't be assigned issues and be billed for your workspace. To reactivate your account, you will need an invite to a workspace at this email address.
editor_is_not_ready_to_discard_changes: Editor is not ready to discard changes
failed_to_move_issue_to_project: Failed to move issue to project

widgets.title: It's Quiet Without Widgets, Turn Them On
widgets.description:
It looks like all your widgets are turned off. Enable them
now to enhance your experience!

snoozed.title: Snoozed
snoozed.description: {days, plural, one{# day} other{# days}} to go

general.title: Overview of your projects, activity, and metrics
general.description: Welcome to Plane, we are excited to have you here. Create your first project and track your issues, and this page will transform into a space that helps you progress. Admins will also see items which help their team progress.

comic.title: Everything starts with a project in Plane
comic.description: A project could be a product's roadmap, a marketing campaign, or launching a new car.

general.title: Track progress, workloads, and allocations. Spot trends, remove blockers, and move work faster
general.description: See scope versus demand, estimates, and scope creep. Get performance by team members and teams, and make sure your project runs on time.

comic.title: Analytics works best with Cycles + Modules
comic.description: First, timebox your issues into Cycles and, if you can, group issues that span more than a cycle into Modules. Check out both on the left nav.

public.title: Public
public.description: Anyone in the workspace except Guests can join

error.permission: You don't have permission to perform this action.

general.title: No active projects
general.description: Think of each project as the parent for goal-oriented work. Projects are where Jobs, Cycles, and Modules live and, along with your colleagues, help you achieve that goal. Create a new project or filter for archived projects.

comic.title: Everything starts with a project in Plane
comic.description: A project could be a product's roadmap, a marketing campaign, or launching a new car.

no_projects.title: No project
no_projects.description: To create issues or manage your work, you need to create a project or be a part of one.

comic.title: Everything starts with a project in Plane
comic.description: A project could be a product's roadmap, a marketing campaign, or launching a new car.

filter.title: No matching projects
filter.description:
No projects detected with the matching criteria. 
 Create a new project instead.

all-issues.title: No issues in the project
all-issues.description: First project done! Now, slice your work into trackable pieces with issues. Let's go!

assigned.title: No issues yet
assigned.description: Issues assigned to you can be tracked from here.

created.title: No issues yet
created.description: All issues created by you come here, track them here directly.

subscribed.title: No issues yet
subscribed.description: Subscribe to issues you are interested in, track all of them here.

custom-view.title: No issues yet
custom-view.description: Issues that applies to the filters, track all of them here.

api_tokens.title: No API tokens created
api_tokens.description: Plane APIs can be used to integrate your data in Plane with any external system. Create a token to get started.

webhooks.title: No webhooks added
webhooks.description: Create webhooks to receive real-time updates and automate actions.

exports.title: No exports yet
exports.description: Anytime you export, you will also have a copy here for reference.

imports.title: No imports yet
imports.description: Find all your previous imports here and download them.

state_distribution.title: Issues by state
state_distribution.empty: Create issues to view the them by states in the graph for better analysis.

priority_distribution.title: Issues by Priority
priority_distribution.empty: Create issues to view the them by priority in the graph for better analysis.

recent_activity.title: Recent activity
recent_activity.empty: We couldn't find data. Kindly view your inputs

activity.title: No activities yet
activity.description: Get started by creating a new issue! Add details and properties to it. Explore more in Plane to see your activity.

assigned.title: No issues are assigned to you
assigned.description: Issues assigned to you can be tracked from here.

created.title: No issues yet
created.description: All issues created by you come here, track them here directly.

subscribed.title: No issues yet
subscribed.description: Subscribe to issues you are interested in, track all of them here.

labels.title: No labels yet
labels.description: Create labels to help organize and filter issues in you project.

general.title: Group and timebox your work in Cycles.
general.description: Break work down by timeboxed chunks, work backwards from your project deadline to set dates, and make tangible progress as a team.

comic.title: Cycles are repetitive time-boxes.
comic.description: A sprint, an iteration, and or any other term you use for weekly or fortnightly tracking of work is a cycle.

no_issues.title: No issues added to the cycle
no_issues.description: Add or create issues you wish to timebox and deliver within this cycle

completed_no_issues.title: No issues in the cycle
completed_no_issues.description: No issues in the cycle. Issues are either transferred or hidden. To see hidden issues if any, update your display properties accordingly.

active.title: No active cycle
active.description: An active cycle includes any period that encompasses today's date within its range. Find the progress and details of the active cycle here.

archived.title: No archived cycles yet
archived.description: To tidy up your project, archive completed cycles. Find them here once archived.

no_issues.title: Create an issue and assign it to someone, even yourself
no_issues.description: Think of issues as jobs, tasks, work, or JTBD. Which we like. An issue and its sub-issues are usually time-based actionables assigned to members of your team. Your team creates, assigns, and completes issues to move your project towards its goal.

comic.title: Issues are building blocks in Plane.
comic.description: Redesign the Plane UI, Rebrand the company, or Launch the new fuel injection system are examples of issues that likely have sub-issues.

no_archived_issues.title: No archived issues yet
no_archived_issues.description: Manually or through automation, you can archive issues that are completed or cancelled. Find them here once archived.

issues_empty_filter.title: No issues found matching the filters applied

general.title: Map your project milestones to Modules and track aggregated work easily.
general.description: A group of issues that belong to a logical, hierarchical parent form a module. Think of them as a way to track work by project milestones. They have their own periods and deadlines as well as analytics to help you see how close or far you are from a milestone.

comic.title: Modules help group work by hierarchy.
comic.description: A cart module, a chassis module, and a warehouse module are all good example of this grouping.

no_issues.title: No issues in the module
no_issues.description: Create or add issues which you want to accomplish as part of this module

archived.title: No archived Modules yet
archived.description: To tidy up your project, archive completed or cancelled modules. Find them here once archived.

general.title: Save filtered views for your project. Create as many as you need
general.description: Views are a set of saved filters that you use frequently or want easy access to. All your colleagues in a project can see everyone’s views and choose whichever suits their needs best.

comic.title: Views work atop Issue properties.
comic.description: You can create a view from here with as many properties as filters as you see fit.

filter.title: No matching views
filter.description:
No views match the search criteria. 
 Create a new view instead.

general.title: Write a note, a doc, or a full knowledge base. Get Galileo, Plane's AI assistant, to help you get started
general.description: Pages are thoughts potting space in Plane. Take down meeting notes, format them easily, embed issues, lay them out using a library of components, and keep them all in your project's context. To make short work of any doc, invoke Galileo, Plane's AI, with a shortcut or the click of a button.

private.title: No private pages yet
private.description: Keep your private thoughts here. When you're ready to share, the team's just a click away.

public.title: No public pages yet
public.description: See pages shared with everyone in your project right here.

archived.title: No archived pages yet
archived.description: Archive pages not on your radar. Access them here when needed.

general.title: No comments yet
general.description: Comments can be used as a discussion and follow-up space for the issues

all.title: No issues assigned
all.description:
Updates for issues assigned to you can be 
 seen here

mentions.title: No issues assigned
mentions.description:
Updates for issues assigned to you can be 
 seen here

progress.title: Add issues to the cycle to view it's progress

chart.title: Add issues to the cycle to view the burndown chart.

priority_issue.title: Observe high priority issues tackled in the cycle at a glance.

assignee.title: Add assignees to issues to see a breakdown of work by assignees.

label.title: Add labels to issues to see the breakdown of work by labels.

inbox.title: Intake is not enabled for the project.
inbox.description: Intake helps you manage incoming requests to your project and add them as issues in your workflow. Enable intake from project settings to manage requests.

cycle.title: Cycles is not enabled for this project.
cycle.description: Break work down by timeboxed chunks, work backwards from your project deadline to set dates, and make tangible progress as a team. Enable the cycles feature for your project to start using them.

module.title: Modules are not enabled for the project.
module.description: Modules are the building blocks of your project. Enable modules from project settings to start using them.

page.title: Pages are not enabled for the project.
page.description: Pages are the building blocks of your project. Enable pages from project settings to start using them.

view.title: Views are not enabled for the project.
view.description: Views are the building blocks of your project. Enable views from project settings to start using them.

sidebar_open_tab.title: No open issues
sidebar_open_tab.description: Find open issues here. Create new issue.

sidebar_closed_tab.title: No closed issues
sidebar_closed_tab.description: All the issues whether accepted or declined can be found here.

sidebar_filter.title: No matching issues
sidebar_filter.description: No issue matches filter applied in intake. Create a new issue.

detail.title: Select an issue to view its details.

empty_state.title: Half-written issues, and soon, comments will show up here.
empty_state.description: To try this out, start adding an issue and leave it mid-way or create your first draft below. 😉

delete_modal.title: Delete draft
delete_modal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this draft? This can't be undone.

stickies.title: Your stickies
stickies.no-data: Jot down an idea, capture an aha, or record a brainwave. Add a sticky to get started.
stickies.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this sticky?

empty_state.simple: Jot down an idea, capture an aha, or record a brainwave. Add a sticky to get started.

general.title: Stickies are quick notes and to-dos you take down on the fly.
general.description: Capture your thoughts and ideas effortlessly by creating stickies that you can access anytime and from anywhere.

search.title: That doesn't match any of your stickies.
search.description:
Try a different term or let us know
if you are sure your search is right.

errors.wrong_name: The sticky name cannot be longer than 100 characters.
errors.already_exists: There already exists a sticky with no description

guest.title: Guest
guest.description: External members of organizations can be invited as guests.

member.title: Member
member.description: Ability to read, write, edit, and delete entities inside projects, cycles, and modules

admin.title: Admin
admin.description: All permissions set to true within the workspace.

github.title: Github
github.description: Import issues from GitHub repositories and sync them.

jira.title: Jira
jira.description: Import issues and epics from Jira projects and epics.

csv.title: CSV
